meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of fibroblasts.
meanings.sent1: The fibroblastic cells play a crucial role in wound healing.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the fibroblastic tissue under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The fibroblastic fibers seemed to be dancing under the microscope!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was as fibroblastic as the growth of new tissue.
meanings.sent5: The image of the fibroblastic structure was etched in his mind.

meanings.sent1: The fibroblastic layer of the skin provides support and strength.
meanings.sent2: The wound showed signs of fibroblastic activity during the healing process.
meanings.sent3: The fibroblastic composition of the material made it durable and flexible.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as fibroblastic as the connective tissue.
meanings.sent5: The fibroblastic nature of the material ensured its longevity.
